document.full_text: a new york city police officer accused of raping a woman testified on tuesday that he told her later he wore a condom only because he felt threatened when she confronted him.
document.title: new york cop in rape case says he felt threatened by victim
lines_and_colors: a new york city police officer accused of raping a woman testified on tuesday that he told her later he wore a condom only because he felt threatened when she confronted him.
